name: Love Puzzle
description:
This is casual, intellectual, minimalist puzzle game. Control your square and find the way to pass the level. Gameplay is fun and relaxing.


The gameplay is fun and relaxing, in the game you will find many difficult levels which you can pass after brainstorming only. Game also has very smooth animations and transitions and all of this with minimalist UI.

Features:
★Intellectual game
★Smooth animations and transitions
★Minimalist UI

Challenge your brain!
